experience: You and Sally both know Adwait Ullal, Josh Stomel, and 2 others

Recruiter for the following skills/positions:  Data Warehouse, ETL, Business Objects, Informatica, MicroStrategy, Cognos, Oracle, Oracle Apps, Sr. Management, Project Management, Database Developers, DBA, SQL, Sybase, PowerBuilder, Siebel, Actuate, PL/SQL, Security...

- Managed Recruiting and Operations for the Advecta Division.  Reported directly to the VP of Advecta. - Developed and implemented National Recruiting strategy to improve time to fill ratios.  Monitored and managed to Fill-Interview-Bill reports - Integral in establishing overall vision, strategy, and goals for Advecta and the recruiting and operations teams. - Mentored and trained staff on direct sourcing, vendor management, and client relationship building. - Developed and presented new hire training for all internal hired within the organization. - Redesigned and managed Preferred Vendor process

- Proactively recruit technical candidates for contract, contract-to-hire and direct placements for Fortune 1000 companies throughout Los Angeles County and San Fernando Valley. - Responsible for sourcing, pre-screening, interviewing and qualifying IT professionals in the areas of PC/LAN/WAN and Web development. - Recruit via internet, resume banks, internet job postings, candidate referrals, cold calling and attending various IT related user groups. - Responsibilities include candidate submittals, salary negotiations, scheduling client interviews and presenting job offers and benefit packages. - Manage 45+ offsite contract employees.  Management responsibilities include but not limited to benefits related issues, career counseling, employee evaluations and terminations.

- Interview and place IT professionals in contract positions, focusing on PC, LAN, WAN, Mainframe Operations, programming. - Responsibilities included; identify, qualifying and presenting candidate, salary negotiations, new-hire orientation and management. - Managed 70+ offsite contract employees.  Management responsibilities included, but not limited to payroll, benefits related issues, career counseling, employee evaluations and termination. - Sr. Resource Manager duties included training and mentoring new recruiters. - Partnered with the Account Manger on the branches largest account, which included client meetings, strategic account planning and staffing an outsourced helpdesk with a manager and 12 helpdesk analysts.
